alert.note: Alert for Adams; Clay; Kearney (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 12 at 5:32AM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northern Clay, Adams and northeastern Kearney Counties through 615 AM CDT... At 531 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Heartwell to near Prosser to near Hansen. Movement was east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Hastings and Hansen around 535 AM CDT. Juniata and Trumbull around 540 AM CDT. Inland around 545 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Harvard, Saronville, Sutton, Clay Center and Glenvil. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
